title: Arblade-le-Bas
text:
Arblade-le-Bas (; ) is a <a href="Communes%20of%20France">commune</a> in the <a href="Gers">Gers</a> <a href="Departments%20of%20France">department</a> in southwestern <a href="France">France</a>.
Geography.
Arblade-le-Bas is located in the <a href="canton%20of%20Adour-Gersoise">canton of Adour-Gersoise</a> and in the <a href="arrondissement%20of%20Mirande">arrondissement of Mirande</a>.
